summary: TAKATA RECALL -   PASSENGER AIRBAG INFLATOR NEEDS TO BE REPLACED - WHEN RECEIVED FORD RECALL CARD, TOOK IT TO ALLSTATE FORD IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY - THEY SAID THEY WOULD CONTACT US WHEN PARTS IN --   WE HAVE HAD TO CHECK WITH THEM -- THEY DID NOT KEEP US UPDATED AND HAVEN'T - ITS BEEN OVER A YEAR - WE HAVE TO DRIVE THIS VEHICLE AND RISK DEATH OR DISFIGUREMENT - WE WOULD LIKE TO HAVE IT FIXED.    THANK YOU.
